mapper.select: SELECT WISHLIST_ID, WISHLIST.CAR_DTL_ID, WISHLIST.USER_ID, MANUFACTURER, MODEL, DETAILED_MODEL, PRICE ,DTL_IMG_CAR FROM WISHLIST JOIN CAR_DETAILE_INFO ON CAR_DETAILE_INFO.CAR_DTL_ID = WISHLIST.CAR_DTL_ID JOIN CAR_INFO ON CAR_INFO.CAR_ID = CAR_DETAILE_INFO.CAR_ID WHERE WISHLIST.USER_ID = #{user_id}
